item.title: Debug 31: Miguel de Icaza on Mono
item.description: Guy English and Rene Ritchie interview Miguel de Icaza in Episode 31 of Debug. I liked the interview very much, specially from minute 20 on when Miguel talks about functionality and implementation details of the Mono runtime, async calls, garbage collection…
